snippet: Lists of favorites, staff picks and likes essentially tell us what to buy, while the universe of things not on the list is obscured.
abstract: Lists of favorites, staff picks and likes essentially tell us what to buy, while the universe of things not on the list is obscured.

headline.main: Disruptions: Top 10 Lists Lead to Less Choice on the Web
headline.print_headline: Disruptions: Focus on Top 10 Stifles Web Choices
